21#define ASCII_NBRSP 31 /* non-breaking space */
22#define ASCII_HYPH 30 /* breakable hyphen */
23#define ASCII_BREAK 29 /* breakable zero-width space */
24
25/*
26 * Status level. This refers to both internal status (i.e., whilst
27 * running, when warnings/errors are reported) and an indicator of a
28 * threshold of when to halt (when said internal state exceeds the
29 * threshold).
30 */
31enum mandoclevel {
32 MANDOCLEVEL_OK = 0,
33 MANDOCLEVEL_STYLE, /* style suggestions */
34 MANDOCLEVEL_WARNING, /* warnings: syntax, whitespace, etc. */
35 MANDOCLEVEL_ERROR, /* input has been thrown away */
36 MANDOCLEVEL_UNSUPP, /* input needs unimplemented features */
37 MANDOCLEVEL_BADARG, /* bad argument in invocation */
38 MANDOCLEVEL_SYSERR, /* system error */
39 MANDOCLEVEL_MAX
40};
41
42/*
43 * All possible things that can go wrong within a parse, be it libroff,
44 * libmdoc, or libman.
45 */
46enum mandocerr {
47 MANDOCERR_OK,
48
49 MANDOCERR_BASE, /* ===== start of base system conventions ===== */
50
51 MANDOCERR_MDOCDATE, /* Mdocdate found: Dd ... */
52 MANDOCERR_MDOCDATE_MISSING, /* Mdocdate missing: Dd ... */
53 MANDOCERR_ARCH_BAD, /* unknown architecture: Dt ... arch */
54 MANDOCERR_OS_ARG, /* operating system explicitly specified: Os ... */
55 MANDOCERR_RCS_MISSING, /* RCS id missing */
56 MANDOCERR_XR_BAD, /* referenced manual not found: Xr name sec */
57
58 MANDOCERR_STYLE, /* ===== start of style suggestions ===== */
59
60 MANDOCERR_DATE_LEGACY, /* legacy man(7) date format: Dd ... */
61 MANDOCERR_DATE_NORM, /* normalizing date format to: ... */
62 MANDOCERR_TITLE_CASE, /* lower case character in document title */
63 MANDOCERR_RCS_REP, /* duplicate RCS id: ... */
64 MANDOCERR_SEC_TYPO, /* possible typo in section name: Sh ... */
65 MANDOCERR_ARG_QUOTE, /* unterminated quoted argument */
66 MANDOCERR_MACRO_USELESS, /* useless macro: macro */
67 MANDOCERR_BX, /* consider using OS macro: macro */
68 MANDOCERR_ER_ORDER, /* errnos out of order: Er ... */
69 MANDOCERR_ER_REP, /* duplicate errno: Er ... */
70 MANDOCERR_DELIM, /* trailing delimiter: macro ... */
71 MANDOCERR_DELIM_NB, /* no blank before trailing delimiter: macro ... */
72 MANDOCERR_FI_SKIP, /* fill mode already enabled, skipping: fi */
73 MANDOCERR_NF_SKIP, /* fill mode already disabled, skipping: nf */
74 MANDOCERR_DASHDASH, /* verbatim "--", maybe consider using \(em */
75 MANDOCERR_FUNC, /* function name without markup: name() */
76 MANDOCERR_SPACE_EOL, /* whitespace at end of input line */
77 MANDOCERR_COMMENT_BAD, /* bad comment style */
78
79 MANDOCERR_WARNING, /* ===== start of warnings ===== */
80
81 /* related to the prologue */
82 MANDOCERR_DT_NOTITLE, /* missing manual title, using UNTITLED: line */
83 MANDOCERR_TH_NOTITLE, /* missing manual title, using "": [macro] */
84 MANDOCERR_MSEC_MISSING, /* missing manual section, using "": macro */
85 MANDOCERR_MSEC_BAD, /* unknown manual section: Dt ... section */
86 MANDOCERR_DATE_MISSING, /* missing date, using today's date */
87 MANDOCERR_DATE_BAD, /* cannot parse date, using it verbatim: date */
88 MANDOCERR_DATE_FUTURE, /* date in the future, using it anyway: date */
89 MANDOCERR_OS_MISSING, /* missing Os macro, using "" */
90 MANDOCERR_PROLOG_LATE, /* late prologue macro: macro */
91 MANDOCERR_PROLOG_ORDER, /* prologue macros out of order: macros */
92
93 /* related to document structure */
94 MANDOCERR_SO, /* .so is fragile, better use ln(1): so path */
95 MANDOCERR_DOC_EMPTY, /* no document body */
96 MANDOCERR_SEC_BEFORE, /* content before first section header: macro */
97 MANDOCERR_NAMESEC_FIRST, /* first section is not NAME: Sh title */
98 MANDOCERR_NAMESEC_NONM, /* NAME section without Nm before Nd */
99 MANDOCERR_NAMESEC_NOND, /* NAME section without description */
100 MANDOCERR_NAMESEC_ND, /* description not at the end of NAME */
101 MANDOCERR_NAMESEC_BAD, /* bad NAME section content: macro */
102 MANDOCERR_NAMESEC_PUNCT, /* missing comma before name: Nm name */
103 MANDOCERR_ND_EMPTY, /* missing description line, using "" */
104 MANDOCERR_ND_LATE, /* description line outside NAME section */
105 MANDOCERR_SEC_ORDER, /* sections out of conventional order: Sh title */
106 MANDOCERR_SEC_REP, /* duplicate section title: Sh title */
107 MANDOCERR_SEC_MSEC, /* unexpected section: Sh title for ... only */
108 MANDOCERR_XR_SELF, /* cross reference to self: Xr name sec */
109 MANDOCERR_XR_ORDER, /* unusual Xr order: ... after ... */
110 MANDOCERR_XR_PUNCT, /* unusual Xr punctuation: ... after ... */
111 MANDOCERR_AN_MISSING, /* AUTHORS section without An macro */
112
113 /* related to macros and nesting */
114 MANDOCERR_MACRO_OBS, /* obsolete macro: macro */
115 MANDOCERR_MACRO_CALL, /* macro neither callable nor escaped: macro */
116 MANDOCERR_PAR_SKIP, /* skipping paragraph macro: macro ... */
117 MANDOCERR_PAR_MOVE, /* moving paragraph macro out of list: macro */
118 MANDOCERR_NS_SKIP, /* skipping no-space macro */
119 MANDOCERR_BLK_NEST, /* blocks badly nested: macro ... */
120 MANDOCERR_BD_NEST, /* nested displays are not portable: macro ... */
121 MANDOCERR_BL_MOVE, /* moving content out of list: macro */
122 MANDOCERR_TA_LINE, /* first macro on line: Ta */
123 MANDOCERR_BLK_LINE, /* line scope broken: macro breaks macro */
124 MANDOCERR_BLK_BLANK, /* skipping blank line in line scope */
125
126 /* related to missing arguments */
127 MANDOCERR_REQ_EMPTY, /* skipping empty request: request */
128 MANDOCERR_COND_EMPTY, /* conditional request controls empty scope */
129 MANDOCERR_MACRO_EMPTY, /* skipping empty macro: macro */
130 MANDOCERR_BLK_EMPTY, /* empty block: macro */
131 MANDOCERR_ARG_EMPTY, /* empty argument, using 0n: macro arg */
132 MANDOCERR_BD_NOTYPE, /* missing display type, using -ragged: Bd */
133 MANDOCERR_BL_LATETYPE, /* list type is not the first argument: Bl arg */
134 MANDOCERR_BL_NOWIDTH, /* missing -width in -tag list, using 6n */
135 MANDOCERR_EX_NONAME, /* missing utility name, using "": Ex */
136 MANDOCERR_FO_NOHEAD, /* missing function name, using "": Fo */
137 MANDOCERR_IT_NOHEAD, /* empty head in list item: Bl -type It */
138 MANDOCERR_IT_NOBODY, /* empty list item: Bl -type It */
139 MANDOCERR_IT_NOARG, /* missing argument, using next line: Bl -c It */
140 MANDOCERR_BF_NOFONT, /* missing font type, using \fR: Bf */
141 MANDOCERR_BF_BADFONT, /* unknown font type, using \fR: Bf font */
142 MANDOCERR_PF_SKIP, /* nothing follows prefix: Pf arg */
143 MANDOCERR_RS_EMPTY, /* empty reference block: Rs */
144 MANDOCERR_XR_NOSEC, /* missing section argument: Xr arg */
145 MANDOCERR_ARG_STD, /* missing -std argument, adding it: macro */
146 MANDOCERR_OP_EMPTY, /* missing option string, using "": OP */
147 MANDOCERR_UR_NOHEAD, /* missing resource identifier, using "": UR */
148 MANDOCERR_EQN_NOBOX, /* missing eqn box, using "": op */
149
150 /* related to bad arguments */
151 MANDOCERR_ARG_REP, /* duplicate argument: macro arg */
152 MANDOCERR_AN_REP, /* skipping duplicate argument: An -arg */
153 MANDOCERR_BD_REP, /* skipping duplicate display type: Bd -type */
154 MANDOCERR_BL_REP, /* skipping duplicate list type: Bl -type */
155 MANDOCERR_BL_SKIPW, /* skipping -width argument: Bl -type */
156 MANDOCERR_BL_COL, /* wrong number of cells */
157 MANDOCERR_AT_BAD, /* unknown AT&T UNIX version: At version */
158 MANDOCERR_FA_COMMA, /* comma in function argument: arg */
159 MANDOCERR_FN_PAREN, /* parenthesis in function name: arg */
160 MANDOCERR_LB_BAD, /* unknown library name: Lb ... */
161 MANDOCERR_RS_BAD, /* invalid content in Rs block: macro */
162 MANDOCERR_SM_BAD, /* invalid Boolean argument: macro arg */
163 MANDOCERR_CHAR_FONT, /* argument contains two font escapes */
164 MANDOCERR_FT_BAD, /* unknown font, skipping request: ft font */
165 MANDOCERR_TR_ODD, /* odd number of characters in request: tr char */
166
167 /* related to plain text */
168 MANDOCERR_FI_BLANK, /* blank line in fill mode, using .sp */
169 MANDOCERR_FI_TAB, /* tab in filled text */
170 MANDOCERR_EOS, /* new sentence, new line */
171 MANDOCERR_ESC_BAD, /* invalid escape sequence: esc */
172 MANDOCERR_ESC_UNDEF, /* undefined escape, printing literally: char */
173 MANDOCERR_STR_UNDEF, /* undefined string, using "": name */
174
175 /* related to tables */
176 MANDOCERR_TBLLAYOUT_SPAN, /* tbl line starts with span */
177 MANDOCERR_TBLLAYOUT_DOWN, /* tbl column starts with span */
178 MANDOCERR_TBLLAYOUT_VERT, /* skipping vertical bar in tbl layout */
179
180 MANDOCERR_ERROR, /* ===== start of errors ===== */
181
182 /* related to tables */
183 MANDOCERR_TBLOPT_ALPHA, /* non-alphabetic character in tbl options */
184 MANDOCERR_TBLOPT_BAD, /* skipping unknown tbl option: option */
185 MANDOCERR_TBLOPT_NOARG, /* missing tbl option argument: option */
186 MANDOCERR_TBLOPT_ARGSZ, /* wrong tbl option argument size: option */
187 MANDOCERR_TBLLAYOUT_NONE, /* empty tbl layout */
188 MANDOCERR_TBLLAYOUT_CHAR, /* invalid character in tbl layout: char */
189 MANDOCERR_TBLLAYOUT_PAR, /* unmatched parenthesis in tbl layout */
190 MANDOCERR_TBLDATA_NONE, /* tbl without any data cells */
191 MANDOCERR_TBLDATA_SPAN, /* ignoring data in spanned tbl cell: data */
192 MANDOCERR_TBLDATA_EXTRA, /* ignoring extra tbl data cells: data */
193 MANDOCERR_TBLDATA_BLK, /* data block open at end of tbl: macro */
194
195 /* related to document structure and macros */
196 MANDOCERR_FILE, /* cannot open file */
197 MANDOCERR_PROLOG_REP, /* duplicate prologue macro: macro */
198 MANDOCERR_DT_LATE, /* skipping late title macro: Dt args */
199 MANDOCERR_ROFFLOOP, /* input stack limit exceeded, infinite loop? */
200 MANDOCERR_CHAR_BAD, /* skipping bad character: number */
201 MANDOCERR_MACRO, /* skipping unknown macro: macro */
202 MANDOCERR_REQ_NOMAC, /* skipping request outside macro: ... */
203 MANDOCERR_REQ_INSEC, /* skipping insecure request: request */
204 MANDOCERR_IT_STRAY, /* skipping item outside list: It ... */
205 MANDOCERR_TA_STRAY, /* skipping column outside column list: Ta */
206 MANDOCERR_BLK_NOTOPEN, /* skipping end of block that is not open */
207 MANDOCERR_RE_NOTOPEN, /* fewer RS blocks open, skipping: RE arg */
208 MANDOCERR_BLK_BROKEN, /* inserting missing end of block: macro ... */
209 MANDOCERR_BLK_NOEND, /* appending missing end of block: macro */
210
211 /* related to request and macro arguments */
212 MANDOCERR_NAMESC, /* escaped character not allowed in a name: name */
213 MANDOCERR_ARG_UNDEF, /* using macro argument outside macro */
214 MANDOCERR_ARG_NONUM, /* argument number is not numeric */
215 MANDOCERR_BD_FILE, /* NOT IMPLEMENTED: Bd -file */
216 MANDOCERR_BD_NOARG, /* skipping display without arguments: Bd */
217 MANDOCERR_BL_NOTYPE, /* missing list type, using -item: Bl */
218 MANDOCERR_CE_NONUM, /* argument is not numeric, using 1: ce ... */
219 MANDOCERR_CHAR_ARG, /* argument is not a character: char ... */
220 MANDOCERR_NM_NONAME, /* missing manual name, using "": Nm */
221 MANDOCERR_OS_UNAME, /* uname(3) system call failed, using UNKNOWN */
222 MANDOCERR_ST_BAD, /* unknown standard specifier: St standard */
223 MANDOCERR_IT_NONUM, /* skipping request without numeric argument */
224 MANDOCERR_SHIFT, /* excessive shift: ..., but max is ... */
225 MANDOCERR_SO_PATH, /* NOT IMPLEMENTED: .so with absolute path or ".." */
226 MANDOCERR_SO_FAIL, /* .so request failed */
227 MANDOCERR_ARG_SKIP, /* skipping all arguments: macro args */
228 MANDOCERR_ARG_EXCESS, /* skipping excess arguments: macro ... args */
229 MANDOCERR_DIVZERO, /* divide by zero */
230
231 MANDOCERR_UNSUPP, /* ===== start of unsupported features ===== */
232
233 MANDOCERR_TOOLARGE, /* input too large */
234 MANDOCERR_CHAR_UNSUPP, /* unsupported control character: number */
235 MANDOCERR_ESC_UNSUPP, /* unsupported escape sequence: escape */
236 MANDOCERR_REQ_UNSUPP, /* unsupported roff request: request */
237 MANDOCERR_WHILE_NEST, /* nested .while loops */
238 MANDOCERR_WHILE_OUTOF, /* end of scope with open .while loop */
239 MANDOCERR_WHILE_INTO, /* end of .while loop in inner scope */
240 MANDOCERR_WHILE_FAIL, /* cannot continue this .while loop */
241 MANDOCERR_TBLOPT_EQN, /* eqn delim option in tbl: arg */
242 MANDOCERR_TBLLAYOUT_MOD, /* unsupported tbl layout modifier: m */
243 MANDOCERR_TBLMACRO, /* ignoring macro in table: macro */
244
245 MANDOCERR_MAX
246};
247
248enum mandoc_esc {
249 ESCAPE_ERROR = 0, /* bail! unparsable escape */
250 ESCAPE_UNSUPP, /* unsupported escape; ignore it */
251 ESCAPE_IGNORE, /* escape to be ignored */
252 ESCAPE_UNDEF, /* undefined escape; print literal character */
253 ESCAPE_SPECIAL, /* a regular special character */
254 ESCAPE_FONT, /* a generic font mode */
255 ESCAPE_FONTBOLD, /* bold font mode */
256 ESCAPE_FONTITALIC, /* italic font mode */
257 ESCAPE_FONTBI, /* bold italic font mode */
258 ESCAPE_FONTROMAN, /* roman font mode */
259 ESCAPE_FONTCW, /* constant width font mode */
260 ESCAPE_FONTPREV, /* previous font mode */
261 ESCAPE_NUMBERED, /* a numbered glyph */
262 ESCAPE_UNICODE, /* a unicode codepoint */
263 ESCAPE_DEVICE, /* print the output device name */
264 ESCAPE_BREAK, /* break the output line */
265 ESCAPE_NOSPACE, /* suppress space if the last on a line */
266 ESCAPE_HORIZ, /* horizontal movement */
267 ESCAPE_HLINE, /* horizontal line drawing */
268 ESCAPE_SKIPCHAR, /* skip the next character */
269 ESCAPE_OVERSTRIKE /* overstrike all chars in the argument */
270};
271
272
273enum mandoc_esc mandoc_font(const char *, int sz);
274enum mandoc_esc mandoc_escape(const char **, const char **, int *);
275void mandoc_msg_setoutfile(FILE *);
276const char *mandoc_msg_getinfilename(void);
277void mandoc_msg_setinfilename(const char *);
278enum mandocerr mandoc_msg_getmin(void);
279void mandoc_msg_setmin(enum mandocerr);
280enum mandoclevel mandoc_msg_getrc(void);
281void mandoc_msg_setrc(enum mandoclevel);
282void mandoc_msg(enum mandocerr, int, int, const char *, ...)
283 __attribute__((__format__ (__printf__, 4, 5)));
284void mchars_alloc(void);
285void mchars_free(void);
286int mchars_num2char(const char *, size_t);
287const char *mchars_uc2str(int);
288int mchars_num2uc(const char *, size_t);
289int mchars_spec2cp(const char *, size_t);
290const char *mchars_spec2str(const char *, size_t, size_t *);
